short_summary: National Master Standing Offers for bulk aviation fuels.
description: This RFSO is for bulk aviation fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable. The product must be delivered to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from date of issuance up to and including March 31, 2025.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for Bulk Aviation Fuel

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for bulk aviation fuel under the National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) program.

### Contract Details

* Reference Number: WS3761283182-DOC4690594673
* Solicitation Number: WS3761283182
* Tender Closing Date: August 1, 2024 at 2:00 pm EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: Manitoba, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador, Alberta, Quebec (except NCR), Northwest Territories, British Columbia, National Capital Region (NCR), Saskatchewan, Canada, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Ontario (except NCR)

### Contract Description

This RFSO is a call for National Master Standing Offers for bulk aviation fuel, which will be delivered to various locations across Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from the date of issuance to March 31, 2025. Bidders/Offerors/Suppliers will be required to provide documentation and bid submissions by the specified closing time.

### Amendment to Tender Closing Date

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time is amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on August 1, 2024 by 2:00 pm EDT.

### selection Criteria and Trade Agreements

* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: This RFSO is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the contact information is as follows:

* Isabelle Moreau
* isabelle-moreau@
